extendedInfo.description: Can you help Kiko in his quest to get the precious totem back?Over 100,000 players around the world are already addicted to Kiko: The Last Totem, join them now!_________________Simply swipe each character with one finger to make them move to their respective targets. Use obstacles at your advantage!Solve 80 levels through 3 beautiful worlds, create your own levels using the level editor and share them with your friends!_________________Features:â¢ Solve over 80 exciting and fun levels, divided in three levels of difficultyâ¢ Create your own levels with the easy-to-use Level Editor and send them to your friendsâ¢ Unlock special upgrades and new levelsâ¢ Hours of swiping puzzle funâ¢ Georgous & Crisp graphicsWHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING"Awesome app. Super fun, and not to mention extremely addicting. It even has a level editor to challenge your friends! Awesome. Check it out!" - Player Review"The graphics and sound are absolutely top-notch in this game. If youâre into puzzle games, then this one is a must-own."- 5/5 Appolicious"Kiko: The Last Totem is a competently-made, challenging little puzzle game. It's definitely worth checking out." - 4/5 Gamezebo"This app is a hit in the making. Having the luxury of being able to create and share your own maps alone makes this a worthwhile buy." - AppVader"Kiko: The Last Totem is great example of a truly polished puzzle game on the iPhone." - iPhoneFreak

reviews.title: one of the best.
reviews.comment: everything about this game is great: the graphics, the music, the level of challenge, the fact that you can [but are not impelled] to upgrade it &/or buy related product. it isnt funny like angry birds but it does have a similar level of charm. highly recommended.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Desperately needs suppourt for large screens
reviews.comment: Can\'t even comment on the gameplay, since the screen is crammed into the lower left corner, and there are art assets floating around all over the place. Could be good, I wouldn\'t know.
reviews.author: Danny Ramirez

reviews.title: Imperfect, but brilliant
reviews.comment: Kiko is a great game with lots of potential. With decent graphics, great music and even a hauntingly appropriate voice over for a well prepared story, the uniquely adorable gameplay is well highlighted. My only qualm is that it is a game for a phone, and the graphics do not properly adjust in size for a tablet. Galaxy Tab already has two options to ensure correct resizing, however, this still does not help. Hoping that the developers would fix this soon. Currently uninstalling, so please message me once the problem has been addressed, and I will immediately change my rating to five. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not for big screen
reviews.comment: Used to be perfect on my Desire . Now the screen is even smaller even though I\'m using a One X. Very hard to play. Please fix & I\'ll change my rating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: Black screen with small edge of game showing. I clicked all around the black screen and got it to show up on the \"store\" one time; but clicked back and went to black again Galaxy S4
reviews.author: Aaron Roberts

reviews.title: Gg
reviews.comment: The lvl selection bug was fixed and I finally managed to play. The game itself is fun. The only thing that bothers me is the quit button on the lower right. Make it say options and also add the same action to the menu and back button of the device
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Awesome app, but add support for the Nexus 7 screen. Too small, I think it was made for phones. Add support for tablets, please please please! I love this game!
reviews.author: Nora Dooling

reviews.comment: Enjoyable game, good to pass the time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: But formatted for gs3
reviews.comment: First match the gs3 screen and back button did an instant quit.

reviews.title: The first few stages were ok.

reviews.title: Interesting game
reviews.comment: No problems on HTC Thunderbolt. Good puzzle game.

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Challenging but manageable - great game, I wish there were more like this!
